message.subject: Complexity Science and the Energy Industry Brown Bag
message.content:
M1.1. <>

M1.2. PLEASE JOIN NESA/HEA AT THE "COMPLEXITY SCIENCE AND THE ENERGY INDUSTRY
BROWN BAG" ~ APRIL 18TH, 2001

Flink1.2
M1.3. IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS, PLEASE CALL LANA MOORE AT (713) 856-6525.
[Inform: questions can be directed to Lana Moore, whose phone number is given]
M1.4. THANKS AND HAVE A GREAT DAY!!
[Conventional: thanks, have a great day]
